meanings.def: very surprising, especially in a way that you like or admire
examples: The amazing thing is, he really believes he'll get away with it.
amazing to do something It was truly amazing to see how much work goes into a Broadway musical.
it is amazing how, what, etc… It's amazing how quickly people adapt.
it is amazing that… I find it amazing that people can be so irresponsible.
It’s amazing the difference a few polite words make.
I made an amazing discovery today.
It's amazing how much better I feel.
The results of the treatment were nothing short of amazing.
It's amazing what you can do if you have to.
The market has an amazing variety of fish.
The service is amazing value for money.
The virus spread at amazing speed.
He makes the most amazing cakes.
I saw the most amazing film yesterday!
That looks pretty amazing, doesn't it?
